title: Replace company logo and favicon with new design

requirements.summary: Replace the current company logo in the Header component with the user-provided logo image featuring the shield design with tow truck, American flag 'ETHOS' text, and 'TOWING SERVICES' subtitle
acceptanceCriteria: The Header component displays the new logo from the generated transparent logo file
The logo maintains proper dimensions and aspect ratio
The logo is visible and properly styled within the header layout

file_operations.description: Update the logo src attribute to reference the generated transparent logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/ethos-logo-transparent.dim_400x400.png instead of the current logo. Ensure the img element maintains proper alt text, dimensions, and styling to display the new shield design with tow truck, American flag 'ETHOS' text, and 'TOWING SERVICES' subtitle.

requirements.summary: Replace the company logo in the Footer component with the user-provided logo image
acceptanceCriteria: The Footer component displays the new logo from the generated transparent logo file
The logo is properly sized and positioned within the footer layout
The logo maintains visual consistency with the header logo

file_operations.description: Update the footer logo src attribute to reference the generated transparent logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/ethos-logo-transparent.dim_400x400.png. Ensure the logo maintains proper dimensions, alt text, and styling within the footer's four-column grid layout to match the header logo presentation.

requirements.summary: Update the website favicon to use the new company logo
acceptanceCriteria: The favicon displays the new logo design in the browser tab
The favicon is properly sized (32x32 or appropriate dimensions)
The favicon is visible across all major browsers

file_operations.description: Update the favicon link href attribute in the HTML head to reference the generated favicon at frontend/public/assets/generated/ethos-favicon.dim_32x32.png. The favicon should display the shield design with proper 32x32 dimensions for browser tab visibility.

requirements.summary: Ensure the new logo image has a transparent background, removing any white or solid color backgrounds around the shield design
acceptanceCriteria: The logo displays with full transparency around all edges
No visible background artifacts or white boxes appear around the logo
The logo integrates seamlessly with the header and footer backgrounds

file_operations.description: Verify that the Header component references the transparent logo file frontend/public/assets/generated/ethos-logo-transparent.dim_400x400.png and does not apply any background styles that would interfere with transparency. Ensure the logo integrates seamlessly with the header background without visible white boxes or artifacts.

Verify that the Footer component references the transparent logo file frontend/public/assets/generated/ethos-logo-transparent.dim_400x400.png and does not apply any background styles that would interfere with transparency. Ensure the logo integrates seamlessly with the footer background without visible artifacts.
